string-array.name: bus_shedules
string-array.item: Route number 1 (one) goes from City DK to IOMZ through ul. May Day
Route 2 (deuce) departs from the City DC and moves to IOMZ through the Sands
Route number 3 departs from City DK - the last stop is ul. Lomonosov
Route number 4 leaves from Business Club - ul. Comintern
Route number 5 is sent from the City DK - Bakery Plant through the street. May Day
Route number 6 departs from City DK - ul. Airfield through the street. May Day
Route number 6/1 departs from City DK - ul. Solar through the street. May Day
Route number 7 departs from City DK - ul. Guerrilla
Route number 8 is sent from the City DC - Sq. Revolutions through the Sands, railway station, railway market
Route 9 is sent from City DK - TB Dispensary
Route number 10 is sent from City DK - IOMZ night ring
Route number 11 is sent from the City DK - st. Nekrasov through Sands
Route number 13 departs from City DK - IOMZ via ul. School, Moscow
Route number 14 departs from City DK - ul. Steppe
Route number 15 leaves from City DK - ul. Pavlova
Route number 16 departs from City DK - ul. M. Fedorenko through the street. May Day
Route number 17 departs from City DK - ul. Schmidt
